original_title: The Gentleman Bank Robber: The Story of Butch Lesbian Freedom Fighter Rita Bo Brown
overview: The story of Rita Bo Brown, a working-class butch from rural Oregon, an anti-authoritarian, anti-capitalist, ex-prisoner and member of the militant, underground George Jackson Brigade, active in the 1970s in the Pacific Northwest.
title: The Gentleman Bank Robber: The Story of Butch Lesbian Freedom Fighter Rita Bo Brown
